title: Can you buy RP with a Visa gift card?
body:
I want to buy some rp, but my local store has no rp gift cards. However they do have Visa gift cards, and I know you can use Visa credit cards to buy rp. My question is, can you buy rp with a Visa gift cards, and if so, how?? Any body who has done so recently, please leave how you did, or if its not possible, thats ok.

Thank you!!

replies.body: A Visa Gift card should still be treated as a credit card by our systems, so you shouldn't have any issues.  Feel free to reach out to us if you run into any trouble, though.  We're happy to help!
